thread.title: GM Ron Hextall committed to long view on building Flyers

title: GM Ron Hextall committed to long view on building Flyers
text:
Published By: Philly Flyers - Today 
Rather than trying to build his team with quick fixes that might not work, general manager is taking a patient approach....
